channel.title: INtravel
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtravel, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Amazing offer: Earn 50K Capital One miles after spending $1K on Disney/Universal tickets (targeted)
item.description: Capital One is targeting cardholders with high-value mileage bonuses. For example, you could earn 50,000 miles after spending $1,000 on theme park tic...

item.title: Here are the best Cyber Monday travel deals of 2025
item.description: A roundup of 2025's best Black Friday, Cyber Monday and Travel Tuesday deals for flights, hotels, cruises and more.

item.title: All the best Cyber Monday and Travel Tuesday flight deals (so far)
item.description: Act fast to save hundreds on airfare with these Black Friday, Cyber Monday and Travel Tuesday flight deals for 2025.

item.title: The best Cyber Monday and Travel Tuesday hotel deals in 2025
item.description: This is a great time of year to take advantage of deals from many hotel brands and booking services. Here are a few of our favorites.

item.title: Rove Miles Cyber Monday and Travel Tuesday deals: Rack up transferable rewards on hotels, flights and more
item.description: Learn how you can rack up Rove miles on travel bookings and gifts this Cyber Monday and Travel Tuesday, and what you can do with them.
